resources.string:
Are you sure, you want to Cancel?

If you cancel then your recording won't get submitted and saved, and you will be redirected to home page.

Are you sure?
Do you want to record your video again?
Are you sure you want to Submit?
Are you sure you want to go back?

Are you sure, you want to Back?

If you back then your recording won't get submitted and saved, and you will be redirected to home page.

Are you sure?
Click Rounded Red button to\nstart Video recording
Internet connection could not be established. Please try later.

This will start the recording.

You will be able to record for %1$s mins.

Do you want to proceed?

This will start the recording.

You will be able to record a video Minimum %1$s and Maximum %2$s.

Do you want to proceed?
You must record a video response of
You are below minimum recording time of %1$s
Click on this button to save your Recording
You have a recording that needs to be saved.\nClick Save and Close to upload this recording and get back to assessment
\n\nNOTE : For better quality recording, connect to a WI-FI network.
TIP : Upload works faster on a Wi-Fi network
